items.summary: Eliminate the blank white screen on the deployed site by ensuring the app always renders a visible UI state (login screen, loading state, or error state) at route "/" and protected routes.

Refactor route-level authentication logic in frontend/src/routeTree.tsx to avoid fetching the caller profile via React Query during route beforeLoad (remove reliance on getCallerUserProfileQuery/ensureQueryData there), and instead perform only demo-session routing decisions in beforeLoad; perform non-demo auth/profile checks in UI components where hooks are valid.

Update frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx so that when profile is missing (and demo mode is not active), it renders a safe fallback that navigates to "/login" (and/or shows an inline message) rather than returning null.

Use a single React Query QueryClient instance consistently for both the React Query provider and the TanStack Router context (avoid creating multiple QueryClient instances across frontend/src/main.tsx and frontend/src/App.tsx).
Add a simple global client-side error fallback so that unexpected render/runtime errors show a user-visible error panel with a "Go to Login" action instead of a blank white screen.
